| icon           = poe2 white ynefer icon.png
| description    = Made with juniper berries common to the Eastern Reach, ynefer is popular in the White March and Readceras. Normally distilled in simple household pots with grain mash and various local herbs to meet the maker's preferences, few bottles are exported to the Deadfire. Many of the New Blood Príncipi, especially those with roots in the Eastern Reach covet the potent spirit as a delicacy.
